title: MediaTek and Qualcomm both say they’re No.1 for Android chips in the US [Updated]
content:
Qualcomm’s Snapdragon series is usually the first thought when it comes to what powers an Android phone in the US, but it seems times are changing. According to a new report, MediaTek processors are now the most common chips found in Android phones sold in the US — Qualcomm disagrees.

more…

The post MediaTek and Qualcomm both say they’re No.1 for Android chips in the US [Updated] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After years of Qualcomm dominance, MediaTek has taken the top slot for chips in Android smartphones sold in the US.
